law.catch_line: The Department and the sponsor shall execute a community legacy agreement....

text.section: The Department and the sponsor shall execute a community legacy agreement.
The sponsor shall comply with the terms of the community legacy agreement and any regulations the Department adopts to carry out this subtitle.
Not more than 15% of the total financial assistance that the Program provides may be used for noncapital expenditures.

The Department may exercise any remedy provided under the community legacy agreement or by law if a sponsor:
violates any provision of the community legacy agreement; or
ceases to meet the requirements of this subtitle.
